bibl.title: Fetus Magic and Sorcery Fears in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Presented to the Society of Biblical Literature, New England Regional Meeting, 22 April 2005. - 1. Situating the spell [in P. Mich. VI, 423-424]. - 2. Fetuses and magic. - 3. Magic and counter-magic: appeals beyond the system. - 4. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: FRANKFURTER David, Fetus Magic and Sorcery Fears in Roman Egypt.

Presented to the Society of Biblical Literature, New England Regional Meeting, 22 April 2005. - 1. Situating the spell [in P. Mich. VI, 423-424]. - 2. Fetuses and magic. - 3. Magic and counter-magic: appeals beyond the system. - 4. Conclusion.
